choose.when: SELECT MBR_ID FROM WEB_2_5_${uploadProgress.username}_UPLOAD A GROUP BY MBR_ID
choose.otherwise: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RCV_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCV_DT , A.RCV_SEQ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.APPR_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS APPR_DTTM , A.REP_APPR_NO , A.APPR_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SALE_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SALE_DTTM , A.MBR_ID , A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD) AS CARD_DTL_GRP_NM , A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD) AS CARD_DTL_GRP , DECODE(A.CARD_NO,NULL,A.CARD_NO,SUBSTR(A.CARD_NO,1,LENGTH(A.CARD_NO)-8)||'****'||SUBSTR(A.CARD_NO,LENGTH(A.CARD_NO)-3,4)) AS CARD_NO , A.ALCMPN_CD , A.ALCMPN_NM , A.ALCMPN_CD || ' / ' || A.ALCMPN_NM AS ALCMPN , A.MCNT_CD , A.MCNT_NM , A.MCNT_CD || ' / ' || A.MCNT_NM AS MCNT , A.STLMT_MCNT_CD , A.STLMT_MCNT_NM , A.STLMT_MCNT_CD || ' / ' || A.STLMT_MCNT_NM AS STLMT_MCNT , A.PNT_KND_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PNT_KND_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.PNT_KND_CD) AS PNT_KND_NM , A.PNT_KND_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PNT_KND_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.PNT_KND_CD) AS PNT_KND , A.SLIP_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'SLIP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.SLIP_CD) AS SLIP_NM , A.SLIP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'SLIP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.SLIP_CD) AS SLIP , A.SALE_AMT , A.PNT , A.CS_MBR_CMMSN , A.CMMSN , A.PMNT_WAY_CD , A.ORG_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.ORG_CD) AS ORG_NM , A.ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.ORG_CD) AS ORG , A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CAR_OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD) OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_NM , A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CAR_OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD) AS OIL_PRDCT_SGRP , A.SALE_QTY , A.CPN_PRD_CD , A.CPN_PRD_NM , A.CPN_PRD_CD || ' / ' || A.CPN_PRD_NM AS CPN_PRD , DECODE(B.MBR_KOR_NM,NULL,B.MBR_KOR_NM,SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,1,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM)-2)||'*'||SUBSTR(B.MBR_KOR_NM,LENGTH(B.MBR_KOR_NM),1)) AS MBR_KOR_NM , A.CI_NO FROM WEB_2_5_${uploadProgress.username}_UPLOAD A LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_MBR_MST B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID AND B.MBRSHP_PGM_ID = 'A'

choose.when: SELECT MBR_ID FROM WEB_2_5_${uploadProgress.username}_UPLOAD A GROUP BY MBR_ID
choose.otherwise: SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.RCV_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCV_DT , A.RCV_SEQ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.APPR_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS APPR_DTTM , A.REP_APPR_NO , A.APPR_NO , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SALE_DTTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SALE_DTTM , A.MBR_ID , A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD) AS CARD_DTL_GRP_NM , A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CARD_DTL_GRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.CARD_DTL_GRP_CD) AS CARD_DTL_GRP , A.CARD_NO AS CARD_NO , A.ALCMPN_CD , A.ALCMPN_NM , A.ALCMPN_CD || ' / ' || A.ALCMPN_NM AS ALCMPN , A.MCNT_CD , A.MCNT_NM , A.MCNT_CD || ' / ' || A.MCNT_NM AS MCNT , A.STLMT_MCNT_CD , A.STLMT_MCNT_NM , A.STLMT_MCNT_CD || ' / ' || A.STLMT_MCNT_NM AS STLMT_MCNT , A.PNT_KND_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PNT_KND_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.PNT_KND_CD) AS PNT_KND_NM , A.PNT_KND_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'PNT_KND_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.PNT_KND_CD) AS PNT_KND , A.SLIP_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'SLIP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.SLIP_CD) AS SLIP_NM , A.SLIP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'SLIP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.SLIP_CD) AS SLIP , A.SALE_AMT , A.PNT , A.CS_MBR_CMMSN , A.CMMSN , A.PMNT_WAY_CD , A.ORG_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.ORG_CD) AS ORG_NM , A.ORG_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'ORG_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.ORG_CD) AS ORG , A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD , (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CAR_OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD) OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_NM , A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD || ' / ' || (SELECT DTL_CD_NM FROM DW_OCB_INTG_CD WHERE DOMN_ID = 'CAR_OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD' AND DTL_CD = A.OIL_PRDCT_SGRP_CD) AS OIL_PRDCT_SGRP , A.SALE_QTY , A.CPN_PRD_CD , A.CPN_PRD_NM , A.CPN_PRD_CD || ' / ' || A.CPN_PRD_NM AS CPN_PRD , B.MBR_KOR_NM FROM WEB_2_5_${uploadProgress.username}_UPLOAD A LEFT OUTER JOIN DW_MBR_MST B ON A.MBR_ID = B.MBR_ID AND B.MBRSHP_PGM_ID = 'A'
